backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor with types and access-controlled CRUD for user profiles and trip plans including budgeting, itinerary, and travel details.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping theme‑related feature changes to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for all major frontend source files including components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variable color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, profile setup handling, theming, and global app layout.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application layout with header, navigation, logout logic, backdrop styling, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeading.t: Simple reusable section heading component with emoji, title, and optional descriptive text.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate that checks Internet Identity status and shows a branded login screen if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Dialog prompting new users to enter and save their name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/features/budget/BudgetEstim: Utility functions to calculate budget estimates based on hotel, transport, food, and attraction costs.
frontend/src/features/budget/BudgetSecti: UI section allowing users to adjust cost assumptions, view updated budget estimates, and save them to a trip.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/TripCard: Card component displaying trip details with actions to open, duplicate, or delete a trip.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/TripsDas: Dashboard page listing all trips with a hero section and controls to create new trips.
frontend/src/features/emergency/Emergenc: Section for viewing, adding, and deleting emergency contacts for a trip using mutations and templates.
frontend/src/features/emergency/emergenc: Generates default emergency contact templates using a destination input.
frontend/src/features/export/print.css: Defines print-specific styles for formatting pages, typography, and layout during printing.
frontend/src/features/export/TripPlanPri: Displays a printable trip plan with itinerary, accommodations, and generated tips, including print controls.
frontend/src/features/todos/todoModels.t: Provides utilities to determine todo status and filter todos by open, completed, or due-soon.
Renders a to-do list for trips with filtering, adding tasks, and marking completion.
frontend/src/features/trip-planner/intak: Defines the TripIntake interface and validates user-provided trip intake fields.
frontend/src/features/trip-planner/TripP: Implements a multi-step wizard to collect trip details, validate input, and generate a trip plan.
frontend/src/features/trips/MapsNavigati: Shows must-visit places with buttons that open map directions for each location.
frontend/src/features/trips/TripPlanGene: Generates a full trip plan including itinerary, budget, accommodations, and recommendations based on intake.
frontend/src/features/trips/TripPlanPage: Page component that loads a trip plan by ID and displays tabs for overview, budget, to-dos, and emergency sections with loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/trips/TripPlanView: Renders a detailed trip overview including dates, recommendations, packing list, and map links based on a TripPlan.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, trip plans, budgets, todos, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining a dark cool color theme, typography, global styles, and custom shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounts the App component.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Helpers for formatting numbers as INR currency or numeric strings.
frontend/src/utils/maps.ts: Utility functions generating Google Maps search URLs for destinations and places.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, typography, plugins, and extended theme values for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s current project state, goals, design directions, issues, and feature metadata for TripMuse.
